title: AsimovXNA
author: AsimovXNA
created_time: May 31, 2023, 03:52:50 PMLast edit: June 02, 2023, 12:10:11 PM by AsimovXNA
content: https://neurai.org/neurai-bitcointalk.jpgNeurai: A Peer-to-Peer Digital Asset SystemWhat is Neurai?Neurai is a decentralized open source protocol optimized to transfer cryptoassets from one party to another on Layer1. The project aims to integrate NFT and Tokens with IoT and artificial intelligence applications. ROADMAPFirst Stage(2023):- Spread the network over multiple nodes across the planet.- Increase the number of active users- Block explorer for the Assets (NFT/Tokens)- New wallets, including mobile- Agreements with compatible projects, such as FLUX.- Search for a minimum price to guarantee the network.- First exchanges to facilitate access to new users and miners.- Hackathon for developers.- More soon...Second Stage (2023-2024)- Web with documentation for developers.- Libraries to facilitate access to Neurai.- IoT devices such as ESP32 or RISC-V compatible with Neurai.- Hackathon for projects based on Neurai with IoT hardware.Third Stage (2024-2025)- More soon...Network DetailsNetwork Name: NeuraiNetwork Abbreviation: XNAMining Algorithm:  KAWPOW Proof-of-workBlock Time: 1 minuteInitial Block Size: 8 MBBlock Reward Schedule: 50,000 XNA per blockBlock Reward Micro-halvening: 10 days (5%)Maximum Supply: 21,000,000,000 XNADecimal Places: 8Launch Date: 2024-04-17 08:40 UTCGenesis: Fortune 16/April/2023 ¬†Elon Musk agrees A.I. will hit people like an asteroid Network Port: 19000RPC Port: 19001LINKSüìå ¬†Official- Website: https://neurai.org- Github: https://github.com/NeuraiProject- Explorer: https://explorer.neurai.org- Explorer2: https://neuraiexplorer.comüëõ Wallet- Neurai-qt (Windows): https://github.com/NeuraiProject/Neurai/releases/latestüí¨ ¬†Discussion- Twitter: https://twitter.com/neuraiproject- Telegram: https://t.me/neuraiproject- Discord: https://discord.gg/dxJSrSeXjF- Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/neuraiproject- Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@neuraiprojectüì∞ Information- Medium: https://medium.com/@neuraiproject- Coinpaprika: https://coinpaprika.com/coin/xna-neurai- Whitepaper: Soon- RoadMap: Soon‚õèÔ∏è Mining- NeuraiPool: https://neuraipool.com- SatoPool: https://satopool.com- Rplant:https://pool.rplant.xyz/#neurai#connect--------PENDING31/05/2023- Website: Not finished.- Only a windows version compiled, but it is possible to compile for Linux and MAC.- More info in Discord.--------We invite all developers, miners and users to join us on this journey. We don't like fantasies, we don't like smoke and we will gradually take advantage of the knowledge that Neurai creators have to make a connection between blockchain, IoT devices and artificial intelligence.Any questions will be welcome.AsimovXNA

comments.author: AsimovXNA
comments.body: Quote from: lijingang on May 31, 2023, 08:36:52 PMSimple copy and paste that is featureless, unoriginal, useless, unselling, and meaninglessWe want to create a series of connections with IoT equipment from a blockchain and where we can have some control to modify the code we need for this. If we were to make a chain from scratch with an algorithm that nobody has used, we would end up spending a lot of time on something that we don't have the expertise for. Using Ravencoin is simply because its algorithm is ASIC resistant and we want anyone with a GPU to be able to mine freely. Also because it has many libraries available and saves us a lot of work for interconnect development.I don't know if there are other projects working with micro-controllers and interoperability with blockchain, I haven't seen anything except some things for Bitcoin. Doubts will always be there and we can't prove we are not scammers with words alone.Come by in two months and ask us again

comments.author: AsimovXNA
comments.body: Quote from: kgdmtd999777 on May 31, 2023, 10:45:34 PMIt took two months of pre-mining before it was taken out, or is it a copy-and-paste algorithm, cutting leeks? ? ? ? ?Perhaps we have sinned of ignorance, but the announcement was not made here and was made via twitter. Nor did we start with a pool or explorer or wallet, we had to compile it ourselves.A few days ago a user of our Discord advised us to spread the announcement here, although the truth is that I have seen that there are many coins that do not do any of this. We are going to make a lot of mistakes along the way, I won't deny that, but we will try to work it out as problems come up.

comments.author: crackfoo
comments.body: Hi, We've added Neurai (XNA) to http://zpool.ca/algo/kawpow. See below for connection details.Fee only: 1% or lessBTC payouts are processed once a day for balances above 0.0015Payouts for all other currencies are made automatically every 4 hours for balances above 0.05 and balances more than 0.0125 are included in one of the payouts each day.- Sample configurations -To mine kawpow and get paid in XNA:Code:-a kawpow -o stratum+tcp://kawpow.mine.zpool.ca:1325 -u XNA_ADDRESS -p c=XNA Exchange to BTC:Code:-a kawpow -o stratum+tcp://kawpow.mine.zpool.ca:1325 -u BTC_ADDRESS -p c=BTCAll of our ports are NiceHash friendly, no need to specify any extra detailsSSL/TLS is available for all ports. Simply prepend the port with a 5. Example for kawpow: 51325==============================Support: https://discord.gg/n45n6Jj Twitter: https://twitter.com/_zpool_

comments.body: I love the fact that this project try to tickle with Simple, but powerfull, IoT device like the ESP family.That was a worry for me to see all centralized company developping trademark device for something decentralize lol... ¬†Making infrastructure and hardware opensource/decentralize is the way to go

comments.author: deepara
comments.body: Asimov's saga with XNA began with the establishment of a vision ‚Äì a vision that transcended mere technology and delved into the realms of honesty, integrity, and real-world impact. When the tumultuous closure of Txbit exchange left many projects in disarray, Asimov and his team exhibited unparalleled agility by swiftly partnering with CoinEx. This strategic move not only demonstrated their adaptability but also showcased their focus on real-world utility over short-term marketing strategies.Thank you asimov
